events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of May 1st, involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under 'Auto Accident' based on the reported keywords and incident details.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the customer’s auto accident case to ensure proper follow-up and assistance.
The customer received official acknowledgement of their claim via email, including details about the next steps.
The agent requested submission of relevant documents including police report, photos of damages, and vehicle registration.
Customer uploaded all requested documents promptly, providing clear images of the accident scene and official reports.
The claims investigator began analyzing the submitted evidence and contacted witnesses to verify accident details.
Investigation confirmed fault was with the other driver; all findings compiled and ready for review.
A settlement proposal was sent to the customer, detailing coverage amounts and repair cost reimbursement.
Customer responded with appreciation for the thorough handling and accepted the proposed settlement.
The claim was formally approved by the underwriting team based on the investigation outcomes.
Payment covering vehicle repair costs was processed and issued to the customer’s account.
The claim was officially closed after payment issuance and confirmation that repairs were completed satisfactorily.
All claim documents and communications were archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
